text: eheth podu apekshaka mathayen baharawa sitina eksath jathika paksha nawaka saha tharuna manthriwaru sanwidhayakawaru rasak mewara janadhipathiwaranaya sadaha ejapayenma apekshakayeku idiripathkala yuthu yayi tharaye prakashakirima saha eeta sajith premadasa mahatha namkirimath samaga ranil wikramasinha pramukha ranil wadin athara saha podu apekshakaya kandayam athara abhyanthara gatum awili athayi thathu palaweyi.
madan himbautu anduranne na.
owunge patamala siyallama hasurawannata sudusukam saha athdakim bahula des wides guruwarun sahabhagi karawanne obata supiri sewayak saha adhyapanayak laba dime balaporoththuwen thamayi.
"na mage ran kanda, wasthuwa mage nirmala nisaka premaya obata hara kata nam pudannada?
apo dan inna podi unta gem gahana ekayi tiwi balana ekayi arunama kiyawana wage eewa arahan.

ee sandaha thawa thawath hitapu ho aluth horu, aparadhakaruwanta wishesha waraprasada denawa wenuwata nithiye rakawarana samata ekak kala pasu bandhanagara rohal ho wishesha sira madiri awashya nowanu atha.
prawahana wisheshagnyayange adahasda salakillata ganimin niyamana paddhathiyak sakas kirima ha kriyathmaka kirima prawahana baladharinge wagakimaya.
kotas dekama baluwa sigithi.
apith ape uthsahaya athahariye na.
kalayak yanakota game gode hama thanakama kawili warga hadanna yana eka mage rakiyawa wuna.
paswanne sitina shani sathuran jaya gani.

me sakachchawata sahabhagi wi siti sajith premadasa amathiwaraya , kisidu adahasak pala nokara pasekata wi siya jangama durakathanaya kriyathmaka karamin sita tika welawakin nagita giya bawada anidda wetha wartha weyi.
mangala hakim ekka ekathuwela noyek boru prachara gena giya.

sinhalathwa danuma rajaye nila danuma bawata path kirima (dewani kotasa) mage 2010 mayi 12 wani dina lipiye nalin da silwa mahatha nirmanaya kara athi danuma pasalwala iganwiya yuthu yayi ki wahama "ape danuma ugath ayata rakiya denne kawuda?", "batahira no wana danuma pasalwala iganwimata giya hoth batahirayan apata aarthika sambadhaka pamunuwanu athi da?"
lajjawak nathiwa thawama widhayake sapa windinawa...

me sambandhayen wiwidha madhya haraha adahas dakwa athi prasawa ha nariweda waidyawaru prakasha karanneda madhaya haraha pala kala wada sathkam 4000k sidukirima wani rahas aparadhayak thani waidyawarayakuta kisisethma sidukala nohaki bawaya.
widesha shramikayan lankawe pradhana aadayam margayak.
ethanin midunama mamath oba wagema samanya gahaniyak.
namuth owun idiripath karana wiwechana diha balana wita thaman aawadana dahama thulin labagannata owunta kisiwak nathuwado!
ehi di owun pawulwalin wenkara thaba samalingikathwaya thamangen aathwana thek yagnya kirimata yomu karawayi.
ee sambandhayen obe adahasa?samaharu ada eka rayakin janapriya wenna hadanawa.
eeta passe hoda ganna al wathura ho unu wathura dekama athi pamanata mahajana wasikili athi rataka thiyenawa.
ee shri lanka nidahas pakshaye manthriwaru kala deta ekata eka kirimak lesaya.
ehema naththan ayin karanna ooni.

boho blog walath wenne eeka rayigam…mokak hari allan ohe kiyawanawa his tharka dada..sabjekt eka danna manussayek awith deyak kiwwa gaman , ee manussayage aniyam birinda waru gana , wyapara wala sujatha bhawaya , akuru adayi kima , wideshikayekda swadeshikayekda wage dewal gana his prashna ahanawa..

ese ma mullak sahitha idamak mila di ganimata boho denek kamaththak dakwanne na.boho wita ewani idam mila di ganne athe mite yahamin mudal nomathi udawiya.

ema awasthawe di aya wisin thaman thula da mathu budu bawa prarthana kirimata athi athimahath kamaththa pilibandawa siya soyuru purana dipankara budunta danum dena lesath pawasanu labuwa.ee anuwa, purana dipankara budun siya naganiyage athithathma pilibanda smaranayaka yedi ayata mema sithuwilla mita aathmabhawa thunaka sita athi wuwak bawa daka, mathu solasa kalpa lakshayak giya thana nirmanaya wana sara manda kalpaye di buduwana obagenma niyatha wiwarana laba ‘siddhartha gauthama’ namin budu bawa labana bawa dipankara bosath thawusanan samanga pawasuwa.
